updates.text: NEL is back to regular svc. Once again, we are very sorry for the inconvenience caused.
NEL is back to regular svc. Free bridging & regular bus svc are still available at designated bus stops. Once again, we are sorry for the inconvenience caused.
NEL Service is progressively resuming due to Signaling Fault. Additional travel time of about 5 minutes may be expected. We are sorry for the inconvenience caused.
NEL Service is progressively resuming due to Signaling Fault. Additional travel time of about 10 minutes may be expected. We are sorry for the inconvenience caused.
NEL Service is delayed due to Signaling Fault. Additional travel time of about 20 minutes may be expected. We are sorry for the inconvenience caused.
NEL Service Delay - To assist with your journey, free regular & bridging bus services available at designated bus stops between DBG and PGC.
